item.title: High Frequency (HF) Communication System – Both Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF/SATCOM communication requirements.
The Dispatcher and Captain will refer to OPS Spec B45/B50.
Reference FOM Communications chapter for additional information.
Communications must be maintained with ATC and company.
Operations in RNP–4 airspace are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "Both HF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
